definition: to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote

sentences.english: I don`t know when or why it was torn down.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是什麼時候或者爲什麼給拆遷了。

sentences.english: Land acquisition and demolition of illegal behavior, according to the law severely punished.
sentences.chinese: 對違法違規徵地拆遷行爲，依法依規嚴肅查處。

sentences.english: Dismantles how support an own legal property right and the right to life?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，拆遷戶怎樣維護自己的合法的財產權和生存權？

sentences.english: Among those new loans, 590.9 billion yuan was held by rural households, according to the regulator.
sentences.chinese: 在這些新貸款中，有5909億支付給了農村拆遷戶。

sentences.english: The report said that more local governments were taking the place of demolition or relocation companies in forced evictions.
sentences.chinese: 報告稱更多的地方政府用強迫手段進行拆遷。

sentences.english: The real estate developer compensated the local residents for the cost of moving.
sentences.chinese: 房地產開發商付給當地居民拆遷費。

sentences.english: During the period of legal proceedings, the demolisher may, according to law, make an application to the people's court for advance execution.
sentences.chinese: 訴訟期間，拆遷人可以依法申請人民法院先予執行。

sentences.english: Just half month ago, massive demolition began on the plant.
sentences.chinese: 半個月前，肉聯廠已經開始大規模拆遷。

sentences.english: A church would also be dismantled and moved inland.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的一所教堂也將被拆遷到內陸去。

sentences.english: The dismantlement appraisal date shall be the date of issuance of license for house dismantlement .
sentences.chinese: 拆遷估價時點一般爲房屋拆遷許可證頒發之日。

sentences.english: The dismantlement appraisal date shall be the date of issuance of license for house dismantlement .
sentences.chinese: 拆遷估價時點一般爲房屋拆遷許可證頒發之日。

sentences.english: Besides, the corporation possesses qualification to evaluate movement of houses in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 本公司另具有上海市房屋動拆遷評估資質。

sentences.english: The clients shall sign written entrustment contracts for dismantlement appraisal with the appraisal institutions.
sentences.chinese: 委託人應當與估價機構簽訂書面拆遷估價委託合同。

sentences.english: A contract dispute on granting land-use right resulting from the factory house requisitioned in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 2010年，廠房拆遷中土地使用權出讓合同糾紛案。

sentences.english: After that, we take the moving event of Jiulongpo in Chongqing as case study.
sentences.chinese: 之後又以重慶九龍坡拆遷事件作爲案例研究。

sentences.english: It is the necessity of urban social economic development to reconstruction of the old town.
sentences.chinese: 舊城區拆遷改建是城市社會經濟發展的必然要求。

definition: a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
to go to town/to enter a big city (to live or work)
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
